meta.article_title: September 16, 2013 - Real Tactics Versus Parroting Tactics

real-tactics-versus-parroting-tactics.probleme: Player's inability to develop higher-level tactical skills

debutant.nom: Serve and receive every ball to the opponent's weak forehand
debutant.description: Relentlessly go to the opponent's forehand side until they win two points in a row.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Mixing shots to the backhand side
exercices_complementaires.description: If the opponent camps out on the forehand side, go to their backhand side.

erreurs_a_eviter.erreur: Continuously serving to the opponent's strong forehand
erreurs_a_eviter.description: This allows the opponent to control the backhand diagonal.
